title: How to Play Ghost Recon 2

steps.headline: Be Alert.
steps.description: Glance around the screen or at your radar every once in a while. You do not want to be surprised.

steps.headline: Pick a good gun.
steps.description: If you are good at the sniper you should pick it. Gunner is a great class for big groups of enemies as well as grenadier.

steps.headline: Know where you are.
steps.description: If you get lost on a particular map or do not know where that sniper is you should go back again by your self and get familiar.

steps.headline: Take Cover.
steps.description: Remember, this is not halo, you can be killed in 1 hit. Hide behind walls and trees or anything that bullets can't fly through.

steps.headline: Teamwork.
steps.description: When playing on campaign you should know how to give your team commands. On Xbox Live you should have good communication with your partners.

steps.headline: Conserve ammo.
steps.description: Unless you are a Gunner and especially if you are a Sniper you must use ammo only when you think it is wise to shoot.
